posts.title: Kellnr 6.0.0 Release
posts.summaryHtml: Kellnr 6.0.0 brings a new CLI interface, OAuth2/OIDC authentication, and important configuration changes. This guide covers breaking changes and how to upgrade safely.

posts.title: Kellnr 2025 - A Year in Review
posts.summaryHtml: A look back at Kellnr's development in 2025: S3 storage, webhooks, new web interface, and contributions from 16 community members across 9 releases.

posts.title: Testing Assembly Code with Rust
posts.summaryHtml: Learn how to test inline assembly code in Rust applications using unit tests and integration testing strategies.

posts.title: Wrapping Cross-Platform Native Libraries in Rust
posts.summaryHtml: Learn how a native shared C library is wrapped in a cross-platform Rust library and used in a cross-platform Rust application.

posts.title: Kellnr 5.0.0 release
posts.summaryHtml: Version 5.0.0 of Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is released. It switches from rocket.rs to axum, removes the git index support and has refactored settings.

posts.title: Kellnr goes Open Source
posts.summaryHtml: Kellnr, the private Rust registry, is now open source under the MIT license.

posts.title: Leveraging the Type System for Domain Modeling in Rust
posts.summaryHtml: Use domain modeling in Rust to achieve separation of concerns, code decoupling and a better understanding of your domain.

posts.title: Kellnr 3.0.0 Release
posts.summaryHtml: Kellnr 3.0.0, the private rust registry, is released. This release includes a new UI and many improvements under the hood.

posts.title: Rust Supply Chain Security
posts.summaryHtml: What are the security risks of using Rust in your supply chain and how to mitigate them.

posts.title: Asynchronous Closures in Rust - Box and Pin
posts.summaryHtml: Understand asynchronous closures in Rust and how they relate to Box and Pin.

posts.title: WebAssembly Compiler - Building a Runtime
posts.summaryHtml: Write a WebAssembly runtime in Rust that can execute WebAssembly modules.

posts.title: WebAssembly Compiler - Building a Compiler
posts.summaryHtml: Write a compiler in Rust to compile a WebAssembly AST to binary.

posts.title: WebAssembly Compiler - Building a Parser
posts.summaryHtml: Write a parser in Rust for the WebAssembly text format.

posts.title: WebAssembly Compiler - Text format and AST
posts.summaryHtml: Understand and parse a WebAssembly abstract-syntax-tree (AST) using Rust.

posts.title: Improve Rust compile times with sccache
posts.summaryHtml: Improve build times by utilizing sccache and S3 to cache compilation results over multiple builds in your Rust CI/CD pipeline.
